content.rendered:
2023 Women’s World Cup Final Packages

The entire tournament has been building towards this: the Women’s World Cup Final. The epic conclusion of this prestigious tournament is four years in the making and the excitement is like nothing else. Regardless of which two teams are left standing at the end, the excitement and thrills are guaranteed.

Our custom-crafted 2023 Women’s World Cup Final experiences include a match day experience during the championship final, first-class accommodations in Sydney, daily breakfast and more, including and the friendly and helpful assistance of our on-site host team while abroad. We’ll be there every step of the way to make sure that your Women’s World Cup vacation is nothing short of amazing.

Complete 2023 Women’s World Cup Final Packages are available from $4,875 per person, based on double-occupancy. Combine this package with our Auckland Semi-final package and experience both host countries during the pinnacle of the 2023 Women’s World Cup. Or extend your stay in Sydney by adding pre-nights so you can be there during all of the city’s playoff matches.
